subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Beñat Intxausti won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and the favorite, Vincenzo Nibali, retained the overall lead as the race entered the final week.
snippet: Beñat Intxausti won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, and the favorite, Vincenzo Nibali, retained the overall lead as the race entered the final week.
